items.title: Chardham Yatra
items.subtitle: ...Voice of Conscience
items.route: Delhi – Haridwar – Yamunotri – Gangotri – Kedarnath – Badrinath – Rishikesh – Delhi
items.description: (Holy confluence, scenic surroundings and an aura of spiritual serenity make an ideal abode for the Gods and are a refreshing reward for the pilgrims who visit Chardham)
